page.title: 15SPORT/PAST-TIMES
page.content: By far the most{popular recreation}in the area would appear to be{horse {riding.}The quiet country roads of the area are constantly used by riders - young and old.Numerous fields and paddocks contain the pets of local residents.Several{riding schools}have been established. The village of West Ashling supports both a{football and cricket}team.The soccer is played on the "School Dell" whilst the cricket team pay a "peppercorn rent" for their ground. { Badminton}is played at the private school Oakwood and is open to locals. Several of the larger houses have their own{tennis courts and swimming} {pools}which sometimes are used by the community. Bosham is a{sailing centre}whilst inland W.Ashling houses the National Board Sailing Information centre.
